info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:12PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Macon, southwestern Transylvania and southeastern Jackson Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles southeast of Franklin, or near Cashiers, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cashiers, Lake Toxaway, Gorges State Park, Lake Glenville, Highlands, Sapphire, Wolf Mountain and Whiteside Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
